text: “ ‘Mũthenya ũcio-rĩ, nĩngaahe Gogu handũ ha gũthikanwo kũu bũrũri-inĩ wa Isiraeli, gĩtuamba-inĩ kĩa agendi arĩa mathiiaga mwena wa irathĩro werekeire Iria rĩa Cumbĩ. Nao agendi magirĩrĩrio gũcooka kũgera njĩra ĩyo, tondũ Gogu na kĩrĩndĩ gĩake nĩkuo magaathikwo. Nĩ ũndũ ũcio hageetagwo Gĩtuamba kĩa Hamoni-Gogu.
